lines: fragColor = blend(fragColor, intersect_layer(u_IntersectTint, normal, elevation, u_PackedIntersectParams, s_SlopeAngleShadeTexture, s_SlopeAspectShadeTexture, s_ElevationShadeTexture, s_ElevationShadeTextureRes));

uniforms.name: u_PackedIntersectParams
uniforms.comment: packed as (inverted, max normal z for slope aspect, elevation extents -- a vec2)
